name: RetrieveProjectDomains
description:
Retrieve domains linked to a specific project.

Use this tool to get the domains associated with a project by providing the project's ID or name. This can help manage and review project-related domains efficiently.

parameters.name: project_id_or_name
parameters.description: Specify the unique project identifier or the project name.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: filter_production_domains
parameters.description: Set to 'true' to filter only production domains; otherwise, returns all.

value_schema.description: Filters only production domains when set to `true`.

parameters.name: filter_target_domain
parameters.description: Specify 'production' or 'preview' to filter domains based on their target environment.

value_schema.description: Filters on the target of the domain. Can be either \"production\", \"preview\"

parameters.name: custom_environment_id
parameters.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project.

value_schema.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project

parameters.name: filter_by_git_branch
parameters.description: Specify the branch to filter domains associated with that branch.

value_schema.description: Filters domains based on specific branch.

parameters.name: include_redirect_domains
parameters.description: Specify whether to include redirect project domains. Use "true" to include (default), "false" to exclude.

value_schema.description: Excludes redirect project domains when \"false\". Includes redirect project domains when \"true\" (default).

parameters.name: filter_by_redirect_target
parameters.description: Specify the redirect target to filter domains. Useful for targeting specific redirections.

value_schema.description: Filters domains based on their redirect target.

parameters.name: filter_by_verification_status
parameters.description: Filter domains by their verification status (e.g., verified, unverified).

value_schema.description: Filters domains based on their verification status.

parameters.name: max_domains_to_list
parameters.description: The maximum number of domains to list in the response, with a maximum value of 100.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of domains to list from a request (max 100).

parameters.name: domains_created_since_timestamp
parameters.description: Get domains created after this JavaScript timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get domains created after this JavaScript timestamp.

parameters.name: created_before_timestamp
parameters.description: Get domains created before this JavaScript timestamp for filtering results.

value_schema.description: Get domains created before this JavaScript timestamp.

parameters.name: domains_sort_order
parameters.description: Sort order for domains based on creation date.

value_schema.description: Domains sort order by createdAt

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug representing the team on whose behalf the request is made.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.description: Filters domains based on their redirect target.

parameters.name: verified

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of domains to list from a request (max 100).

value_schema.description: Maximum number of domains to list from a request (max 100).

parameters.description: Get domains created after this JavaScript timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get domains created after this JavaScript timestamp.

parameters.name: until

value_schema.description: Get domains created before this JavaScript timestamp.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Domains sort order by createdAt

value_schema.description: Domains sort order by createdAt

parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name
